issue.title: [JS] Infer types for plain JS arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12580](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12580). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be great if one could pass a normal js array to arrow and have some simple type inference. This could be similar to https://github.com/uwdata/arquero/blob/af843a4377254bab970d40559879f9191fe81079/src/arrow/encode/profiler.js#L15.
